articles.title: Post Office hires ex-police to check its investigators in Horizon scandal - BBC.com
articles.description: The Post Office says the team will look into allegations that have emerged during a public inquiry.
articles.content:
The Post Office scandal has been described as one of the UK's biggest miscarriages of justice
The Post Office has hired investigators, including some ex-police, to look at its own staff's previous w… [+4438 chars]
